long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tame Your Twitter Feed: X Content Filter Chrome Extension

Say goodbye to the noise and make your X (formerly Twitter) experience as smooth as you want it to be. The X Content Filter Chrome Extension puts you in control of what you see by letting you block keywords, topics, or accounts that clutter your feed. Whether you’re tired of endless celebrity drama, overhyped tech buzzwords, or just want to avoid politics for a while, this extension helps you curate your timeline to suit your mood and preferences.

Features:

Custom Keyword Filtering: Add keywords to block tweets on specific topics, from celebrity gossip to crypto hype.

Positive Vibes Only: Filter out distressing news, political debates, or other content that brings your mood down.


Personalized Experience: Make your feed feel like yours by easily managing and updating filters from the extension.

Reclaim control over your browsing experience and make Twitter a place you actually enjoy. The X Content Filter Extension gives you the power to decide what content matters to you — and what doesn’t.

Ready to bring the best of X directly to you? Download now and customize your feed today!
